branding.welcomeText: Welcome to Ayushveda Naturals – Authentic Ayurveda, trusted by tradition, approved by AYUSH.
branding.tagline: GMP Certified · AYUSH Approved · 100% Natural Wellness

menu.home: Holistic Ayurvedic wellness for a healthy body and mind.
menu.products: Explore our range of authentic herbal powders, oils, and remedies.
menu.about: We follow AYUSH guidelines and GMP standards to deliver safe and effective products.

contact.title: Follow Us
contact.description: Connect with us on Instagram, Facebook & YouTube for wellness tips.

faq.title: Are your products AYUSH approved?
faq.description: Yes, all our formulations comply with Ministry of AYUSH standards.

faq.title: What does GMP certified mean?
faq.description: It ensures our products are manufactured under strict quality and safety protocols.

faq.title: How do I consume Ayurvedic powders?
faq.description: Usage and dosage are provided on each product label. Consult a physician if needed.

faq.title: Do you provide doctor consultation?
faq.description: Yes, we offer free basic consultation with certified Ayurveda practitioners.

faq.title: Do you ship across India?
faq.description: Yes, we deliver Ayurveda wellness products PAN India.

slides.contentText: Pure formulations rooted in tradition, verified by science.
Manufactured under strict Good Manufacturing Practices for safety and purity.
Authentic products complying with Ministry of AYUSH standards.

features.title: AYUSH Certified
features.description: Every product is approved under AYUSH guidelines ensuring authenticity.

features.title: GMP Manufacturing
features.description: Produced in GMP-certified facilities ensuring safety & consistency.

features.title: 100% Herbal
features.description: No chemicals, no preservatives – only natural herbal ingredients.

features.title: Expert Consultation
features.description: Get guidance from qualified Ayurveda practitioners for better results.
